created_at.description: `ISO 8601 <http://www.w3.org/QA/Tips/iso-date>`_ date of when this debit was created.

adjustments_count.description: The number of adjustments during the invoice period.

adjustment_total_fee.description: The amount of adjustment fees in cents incurred during the invoice period.

bank_account_credit_fee.description: The amount of fees in cents incurred for credits during the invoice period.

bank_account_credits_count.description: The number of bank account credits during the invoice period.

bank_account_credits_total_amount.description: The total amount of all credits during the invoice period.

bank_account_credits_total_fee.description: The total amount of all bank account credit fees incurred during the invoice period.

bank_account_debit_variable_fee_cap.description: The fixed fee cap for bank account debits.

bank_account_debit_variable_fee_percenta.description: The fee percentage rate for bank account debits.

bank_account_debits_count.description: The number of bank account debits during the invoice period.

bank_account_debits_total_amount.description: The total amount of all debits during the invoice period.

bank_account_debits_total_fee.description: The total amount of all debit fees incurred during the invoice period.

card_credit_fixed_fee.description: The fixed fee amount for credits to cards.

card_credits_count.description: The number of credits to cards during the invoice period.

card_credits_total_amount.description: The total amount of all credits to cards during the invoice period.

card_credits_total_fee.description: The total amount of all credits to cards fees incurred during the invoice period.

card_debit_fixed_fee.description: The fixed fee amount for card debits.

card_debit_variable_fee_percentage.description: The fee percentage rate for bank account debits.

card_debits_count.description: The total number of card debits during the invoice period.

card_debits_total_amount.description: The total amount of all card debits during the invoice period.

card_debits_total_fee.description: The total amount of all card debit fees incurred during the invoice period.

card_hold_fee.description: The fixed fee amount for card holds.

card_holds_count.description: The total number of card holds during the invoice period.

card_holds_total_amount.description: The total amount of all card holds during the invoice period.

card_holds_total_fee.description: The total amount of all card hold fees incurred during the invoice period.

dispute_fixed_fee.description: The fixed fee amount for disputes.

disputes_count.description: The total number of disputes during the invoice period.

disputes_total_amount.description: The total amount of all disputes during the invoice period.

disputes_total_fee.description: The total amount of all dispute fees incurred during the invoice period.

failed_credit_fee.description: The fixed fee amount for failed credits.

failed_credits_count.description: The total number of failed credits during the invoice period.

failed_credits_total_amount.description: The total amount of all failed credits during the invoice period.

failed_credits_total_fee.description: The total amount of all failed credit fees incurred during the invoice period.

refund_fee.description: The fixed fee amount for refunds.

refunds_count.description: The total number of refunds during the invoice period.

refunds_total_amount.description: The total amount of all refunds during the invoice period.

refunds_total_fee.description: The total amount of all refund fees incurred during the invoice period.

reversals_count.description: The total number of reversals during the invoice period.

reversals_total_amount.description: The total amount of all reversals during the invoice period.

reversals_total_fee.description: The total amount of all reversal fees incurred during the invoice period.

sequence_number.description: The sequential number of the invoice.

total_fee.description: The total amount of all fees incurred during the invoice period.
